item.title: Mermaid JS support
item.description: Test Link to heading test Bash highlighting Link to heading # Print 123 echo "123" Mermaid Link to heading If you want to use Mermaid-JS on your website. Provide mermaid as Shortcode in your markdown file. flowchart LR A -- B B -- C C -- D D -- B sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice-Bob: Hi Bob Bob-Alice: Hi Alice Find more example on Mermaid-JS website.
